EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Continuous Testing with Tosca CI - 2015.05.27.Email - Invite 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: Continuous Testing with Tosca CI
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: Continuous Testing with Tosca CI
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
We are excited to invite you to our newest webinar, Continuous Testing with Tosca CI! In the webinar, Tricentis’ own Gernot Brandl, Tosca CI Product Manager, will share how to fill the gaps in executing GUI tests in a continuous integration environment with Tosca CI.
Join our webinar to learn how Tosca CI seamlessly integrates into your testing environment and how to:
- Continuously increase quality in a turbulent environment - Meet the increased time-to-market demands - Create a guaranteed risk-free safety net
Our “Continuous Testing with Tosca CI” webinar will take place on May 27th, 2015, starting at 4:00 p.m. CET.
We look forward to seeing you at our webinar! Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
<http://www.tricentis.com/resource-assets/continuous-testing-with-tosca-ci-27-05-2015-webinar?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db>
<http://www.tricentis.com/resource-assets/continuous-testing-with-tosca-ci-27-05-2015-webinar?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db> Wed, May 27, 2015 4:00 p.m. – 5:00 p.m. CET 10:00 a.m. – 11:00 a.m. EST
Gernot Brandl Tosca CI Product Manager Tricentis
